description: Number of singular 2 X 2 matrices over Z(n) (i.e. with determinant = 0).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
formula: a(n) = n^4 - A005353(n). Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^(2*e-1)*(p^(e+1)+p^e-1). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Apr 22 2002Dirichlet g.f.: zeta(s-2)*zeta(s-3)/zeta(s-1).A102631(n) | a(n).- R. J. Mathar, Mar 30 2011
author: _David W. Wilson_
